                                                  EventableCondition eventableCondition,

                                                    throws XPathExpressionException
        Checks whether an XPath expression starts with an XPath eventable condition.
        Parameters:
        dom - The DOM String.
        eventableCondition - The eventable condition.
        xpath - The XPath.
        Returns:
        boolean whether xpath starts with xpath location of eventable condition xpath condition
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException
        CrawljaxException - when not can be determined whether xpath contains needed xpath locaton

      • checkXPathUnderXPaths

        public boolean checkXPathUnderXPaths(String xpath,
                            List<String> xpathsList)
        Parameters:
        xpath - the xpath to check if its under a certain set of full-xPaths.
        xpathsList - the set of full-length-xPaths
        Returns:
        true if the xpath is under one of the full-length-xpaths.
